content.detailedDescription:
On a late summers night in july or august of 2013, i believe and at about 10pm-midnight, pehaps. my girlfriend and i were camping on the top of a small mountain range outside of victoria b.C. canada.
we were sitting on the tailgate of my truck, looking east at the big cheesy pre-autumn full moon rising over the mainland. when we observed two round glowing balls or orbs floating around above the mainland and with the moon in the background, which looked exactly like the moon at the time but much smaller. they were bright and orange too, they danced around a little and then one went north along the coast and one came west, towards us.
as both balls left each other they turned white, a bright consistant glowing white. the one coming west flew very slow and on sort of a glide or floating straight path, about maybe 300 feet up. it flew over the saanich peninsula and seemed to be probing the urban pockets on it's way through, it then turned north and continued on past pat bay and towards the malahat hwy. then it crossed the inlet and headed west directly for the heavy forrested side of the moutain and the whole time maintaining the same speed pretty much, which was around 40-60 kms an hour maybe.
the object was anywhere from the size of a large vehicle, such as a big truck. to the size of a small to medium sized house maybe and it definitely had purpose and was aware of where it was going, i had no idea if it knew we were watching it or not.
it proceeded to fly directly into the thick forrest of the side of the range we were on, about 300 yards away from us max. i could pin point where it went in within 50 yards either way, i said to my girlfriend; we should go check it out. she didn't want to or me to alone in the dark, which made sense. i felt no fear or aggression at all though and we camped there anyway, i jokingly said to her.. something about long fingers and green men and we slept fine that night with no known disturbances or inturuptions.
the next day we packed up and left because we had to work on the monday, not because we were freaked out or anything. 
in fact i don't know why i have not gone there with a friend to check out the area, i'm an adventurer at heart and physically fit enough to travese the terrain. it may be on crown land or even someones property, there is a house nearby. but it's like i just forgot about it and not totally forgot, but didn't care enough to go back with a buddy in the daylight and check it out..
which is strange, for me. i saw a youtube video of mount adams in washington, with an opening in the side of the mountain.. yeah that one and it inspired me to finally write this, so if anyone wants to go there lol.. let me know and i'll be more than happy to show you, it's about a 20 min drive outside of victoria.
this is the first time i've repoted anything although i have seen many different ufos, including another orb that year in the fall over the western mountains near kamloops b.C.. again with my girlfriend at the time and on my way back from working in alberta, the firt time i saw one i thought.. someone else had to have seen that, my second thought was.. 
i can't tell anyone, because they'll think i'm crazy. probably typical and i don't care now, i know what i've seen. my eyes and mind don't lie to me, besides they are here and everyone is seeing them. i don't know why they are fooling around anymore and don't just come out with it already, it's silly and ridiculous and most of us are wise to the fact by now and most would be able to handle the news just fine, in todays day and age. 
it's like trying to hide the fact there's no santa clause to a kid whos 12 or something and knows better, who's the more intelligent of the two parties and who looks like an idiot.? really..
content.summary: We observed two orbs, much like the ones you see online. we were camping on a small mountain range looking at a large orange full moon rising over the mainland and the orbs were orange at first and resembled the moon, except much smaller.

content.detailedDescription: I took these pictures from my flight over colorado last week.  this appears to be a massive structure isolated in the mountains with no visible roads leading to or from.
content.summary: I took these pictures from my flight over colorado.  this appears to be a large structure isolated in the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving w/b on highway 86 approaching founders parkway, and i noticed a white object coming from the west way up in the sky with a large plume around it it look like it was flying through the fog but i realized it was a clear night starry sky. i pulled over and watched this object coming in my general direction at what seemed to be a high rate of speed and then it turned to head east originally it was heading northeast and then turned going east with that plume going behind it for about another 5 minutes the plume became so big it covered a large portion of the sky and then it faded off and disappeared in the plume faded away. i was able to film a small portion of it.
content.summary: Flying white light with giant plume coming out from around it indicating fast velocity

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden with my granddaughter. i had bought a new digital
camera and was trying to get a photo of a plane which was very high?
i zoomed in to get the shot and had a pretty good shot of the plane.
i pressed the shutter button but the i had left the auto focus on and the camera zoomed back a little. i presumed the photo was now no good as the 
the plane looked blurred. i did not delete it but later that day i copied the photos of my granddaughter and others i had taken to my pc.
i was going to delete any that were no good as it was a new camera and some were out of focus. but on glancing at the photo of the plane i noticed a small grey dot? i first thought my camera had dust or something on the lens. but on checking other pics there were no other dots!
i then zoomed in on the photo and noticed it looks very much like a grey
oval type item? having watched many ufo programmes on tv i can only
presume that this is what it is? i did not see the ufo when i took the picture as it would have been to small and i was only trying to photo the plane. i only noticed a small dot on the picture but when you zoom in you notice the shape etc.
content.summary: While trying to photo a plane my camera auto focused and on looking saw the object when looking on my pc.

content.detailedDescription:
j'ã©tais dans mon jardin sur ma terrasse au sud pour fumer une cigarette vers 20h, le vendredi 13 octobre 2017. il faisait nuit et le ciel ã©tait trã¨s bien dã©gagã©. j'ai vu arrivã© de derriã¨re les arbres, ã  une bonne centaine de mã¨tres de ma maison, trã¨s silencieusement, une boule trã¨s lumineuse (blanc dorã© jaune orangã©) un peu plus petite qu'une piã¨ce de 1 centime, vu du sol. mais certainement trã¨s grosse, vu l'altitude.

elle ã©tait plus haute qu'un avion de ligne et d'ailleurs absolument pas dans le couloir aã©rien habituel nord/sud (mais dans la direction perpendiculaire ouest/est) mais bien plus basse qu'un satellite pourrait l'ãªtre.

aucun bruit de rã©acteur ou autre bruit de moteur.

elle venait de la direction de mã©nerbes (84) ã  l'ouest, au dessus du petit luberon et s'est dirigã©e en direction de bonnieux ou lourmarin (sud est) en passant au dessus de lacoste.

sa vitesse n'ã©tait pas trã¨s rapide vu du sol, mais plus rapide qu'un avion (car beaucoup plus haut) et beaucoup moins qu'une mã©tã©orite. difficile d'estimer sa vitesse ã  cause de la hauteur, mais sur une route plate, on pourrait la comparer ã  une voiture roulant ã  5 kms/h.

cette sphã¨re a mis environ 1mn pour effectuer sa trajectoire.

j'ai appelã© ma compagne aprã¨s une dizaine de secondes d'observation qui est sortie presque aussitã´t. elle a observã© en mãªme temps que moi cette boule lumineuse, semblant planer rã©guliã¨rement, sans accoup et sans changement de direction. aucune trainã©e derriã¨re elle comme pourrait le faire une ã©toile filante ou une mã©tã©orite rentrant dans l'atmosphã¨re.

elle a disparu de notre champ de vision derriã¨re le luberon, au niveau de la combe, entre le petit et le grand luberon.

j'ai cherchã© sur internet dans les jours suivants si d'autres avaient vu cette sphã¨re,si il y avait des tã©moignages ou si il y avait eu une mã©tã©orite ce soir lã . mais rien sur ce soir du 13 octobre 2017...
content.summary: Objet trã¨s lumineux et gros au dessus du luberon

content.detailedDescription: Outside.Watch the sky every nite for about 2-3 hours.Activity is mainly between 7-8 pm.My neighbor and i were both watching.She saw at the same time to my right a line of bright orange lights.I told her to look to my left but by then my object disappeared.I could not even guess as what it could be.I noticed it because it was larger than anything i had seen before and multi-colored.It just appeared,flashed its brights and disappeared.I was in awe.I wanted it to come back.Also,i know what military flares look like.It was not flares.I am quite used to seeing the a-10s practicing and they (always) travel in pairs.Never alone.I also know the sound of their engines.
content.summary: Glowing orb appeared hovering.Flashed high beams and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to mention a sighting i had of a ufo around 1987. it looked like a star at first but i noticed it was too big to be a star.  i was a passenger watching the oversized star in the southeast night sky. i watched the star uninterrupted for at least 10 minutes.  then i seen it take off in a flash, like one second and it was gone.  but it left an imprint. left in the sky for a few seconds was this flash of greenish-blue light in the shape of a perfect triangle.  this was awesome to witness.
content.summary: I was a passenger looking out the side window.  i watched a star that i knew was too big for a star

content.detailedDescription: I walked to the car and looked up at the stars as i always do.  the night sky was black, crisp, and filled with stars.  i noticed one star was oddly foggy looking.  i wondered what would be causing the blurred misty look.  i pointed the star out to a friend who was with me.  i had to remove something from my car, so i took my attention away from the star for a few seconds.  my friend gasped at something in the sky that caused me to look up.  i saw the star traveling south.  i observed as i watched the star disappearing, that the star was between the mist and the mist was trailing.  the star disappeared before the mist.  i looked back up where the star was and there nothing at first.  suddenly a crisp star appeared in the same spot and disappeared.
content.summary: Stationary foggy star observed.  looked away for 2 seconds, foggy star rapidly moved south. saw star between mist and mist trailing.

content.detailedDescription:
I'd been going through my tablet recently and noticed the object then. the pics were taken with the camera on my phone but saved automatically to my other device.I was taking pictres of the sunset and moon rising as i often do.And again,i didn't notice this then.I do take several pics most of the time because i don't wear my glasses and can't see the screen to good so i'll look at them later to see which are better.I obviously hadn't noticed the object when i started deleting the pics off of my phone or i would have checked into it more then.
 i was at white river bridge in paragon,in fishing and noticed the moon rise was photo worthy and took several pics of it.There are a few before the object appears and a few after but it's only noticeable in 2.The 2 i am sending were taken just a few seconds apart.It is just to the left in the 1st pic at about 9 o'clock.In the 2nd it looks to be behind the small white cloud at about 3 o'clock.The pics are quite a bit clearer on my tablet for whatever reason.But there is a dark shape like the object in the 1st pic obscured somewhat by the cloud.I have the time stamp with date and my location if you decide this is worth your time.Thanks,james harris
content.summary: Didn't see it during taking pics

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 6.30 pm, dark and i was travelling as a passenger in a car from windsor towards maidenhead. i saw aircraft lights on my left, which were decending at around 1500ft, landing west-east at heathrow.

i looked again and saw what i thought was another plane with flashing lights however this craft was closer to me, much lower and travelling east-west.

i observed the craft which flew across the fields in my direction and then banked left to fly parallel with the road i was travelling along, directly left of me. the car was travelling at around 50mph and was moving alongside the craft for quite some time.

at one point the craft was so close i could see that the shape was triangular, with bright white lights at each point. i could see that the craft seemed to have a dome underneath its centre, i noticed what looked like gold coloured foil around a domed part underneath that glowed slightly highlighting the gold coloured material. i also recall that the craft seemed not to be flying flat but leaning slightly to the left for some time. i couldn't make out much at he top of the craft

i remember that there were red and blue flashing lights around the base of the circular centre exactly like the strobing lights on an airplane. i recall there seemed to be more blue lighting more than red. the craft seemed solid and slightly reflected the glow from roadlights. it seemed to be a matt grey.

i tried to take some pictures through the side window with my mobile phone but my view at this point was partially obscured by trees & bushes and reflections on the glass, although you can vaguely see a grey triangle with a white corner in all the bluriness.

the craft continued inn the same general direction but further from the road, where i struggled to keep my eyes on its movement due to the houses that lined this stretch of the road. the craft was flying low on the other side of the houses. when i could see the craft it was moving between the houses.

i lost sight of the craft and continued home which was only a minute away.

i exited the car and scanned the sky to see if i could see it again, it was then i saw it, this time travelling back towards windsor/east. it was crossing in front of me, very close and very low. i was standing in the centre of my car park.

as i went to take the shot the craft turned into an orb of light, the orb seemed to be smaller than when it was in its triangle state. one photo shows the craft in this orb state. 

my phone didn't seem to want to work very well and it seemed frozen when trying to take the shots. when i next looked up the craft had changed back to the triangle shape. it took a long time to actually get the shots, those i did get were very shaky.

the craft was silent and very dark this time, although i could see the blue & red flashing lights, there was no sign of the glow underneath as i had seen earlier. i could still make out the triangular shape of the craft.

it moved onwards very slowly and continued flat and straight into the distance until i lost sight of it. as it moved away i could see two white lights at the rear. as shown on the photos submitted. 

i though i saw it a minute or two later in the distance but it could have been an airliner
content.summary: Various close sightings of triangle craft that orbed

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 6.30 pm, dark and i was travelling as a passenger in a car from windsor towards maidenhead. i saw aircraft lights on my left, which were decending at around 1500ft, landing west-east at heathrow.

i looked again and saw what i thought was another plane with flashing lights however this craft was closer to me, much lower and travelling east-west.

i observed the craft which flew across the fields in my direction and then banked left to fly parallel with the road i was travelling along, directly left of me. the car was travelling at around 50mph and was moving alongside the craft for quite some time.

at one point the craft was so close i could see its shape was triangular, with bright white lights at each point. i could see that the craft seemed to have a dome underneath its centre, i noticed what looked like gold coloured foil around a domed part underneath that glowed slightly. i also recall that the craft seemed not to be flying flat but leaning slightly to the left for some time. i couldn't make out much at he top of the craft

i remember that there were red and blue flashing lights around the base of the circular centre exactly like the strobing lights on an airplane. i recall there seemed to be more blue lighting more than red. the craft seemed solid and slightly reflected the glow from roadlights. it seemed to be a matt grey.

i tried to take some pictures through the side window with my mobile phone but my view at this point was partially obscured by trees & bushes and reflections on the glass, although you can see a grey triangle with a white corner in all the bluriness.

the craft continued in the same general direction but further from the road, where i struggled to keep my eyes on its movement due to the houses that lined this stretch of the road. the craft was flying low on the other side of the houses. when i could see the craft it was moving between the houses.

i lost sight of the craft and continued home which was only a minute away.

i exited the car and scanned the sky to see if i could see it again, it was then i saw it, this time travelling back towards windsor. it was crossing in front of me, very close and very low. i was standing in the centre of my car park and it was directly in front of me at around 80 degrees from the horizon.

as i went to take photos the craft turned into an orb of light, the orb seemed to be smaller than when it was in its triangle state. one photo shows the craft in this orb state. 

my phone didn't seem to want to work very well and it seemed frozen when trying to take the shots. when i next looked up the craft had changed back to the triangle shape. it took a long time to actually get the shots, the ones that i did get were very shaky apart from one showing the orb.

the craft was silent and very dark this time, although i could see the blue & red flashing lights, there was no sign of the glow underneath as i had seen earlier. i could still make out the triangular shape of the craft.

it moved onwards very slowly and continued flat and straight into the distance until i lost sight of it. as it moved away i could see two white lights at the rear. as shown on the photos submitted. 

i though i saw it a minute or two later in the distance but it could have been an airliner
content.summary: Multiple sightings of triangle craft with external lighting

content.detailedDescription: I was taking two birds on the wire fence at my backyard.  accidentally, i tapped on the video feature.  and then i took a couple more photos from the same backyard located at summerlin las vegas..  later on i viewed the photos on my cell phone and found the unknown flying object on the video.  i further checked the other photos i took  around 7am on february 7, 2018.  i found the white unkown object on the sky.  attached, 3 flies (one video and two photos) for review.
content.summary: I found the unkown moving object on the photo and video after viewing the pictures on my cell phone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking last night 06feb2018 about 07:10 pm in el mirage arizona with clear skies looked up noticed a very bright light with a mist only around the light the rest of the skies were very clear. then the light was stationary for at least 30 minutes. it looked as if it was just  hanging in the south west sky there was no noise at all.  then the light just started to move in a easterly direction. as it moved towards me the mist moved with it as it went over me i could see that it was a large triangle shaded craft at about a 1000 feet completely silent as i watched it about 5 minutes it then just disappeared no noise, no more mist, no more light gone.

mike
content.summary: Triangle enveloped in a light mist

content.detailedDescription: Tonight's passing was the faintest of the past 3 nights, possibly the object was at greater altitude than before. each night has been at different time and different direction, and colors seem somewhat different. have had no luck getting local military facilities to acknowledge or deny any aircraft activities, though they generally have stated they would not be operating anything in this vicinity at these times.
content.summary: Third night in a row bright pulsating colored object passing over.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed from my window that the shape of the crescent moon was not right. for some unknown reason i was afraid. the lower crescent was missing from the moon as if something was parked there. it's still there. might be nothing.
content.summary: Half moon, object in front of moon, lower crescent

content.detailedDescription: I live in stockton, california.  i went out around 6:25pm to take out my trash. i looked up toward the south west and saw a bright but fuzzy object, which i thought was a star at first. it caught my attention because the sky was clear, yet the are around this object was hazy. it didn't appear to be moving,  or if it was it was really slow. my wife called me while i was outside.I went in the house to hear her better. when i went back outside maybe a minute or so, i noticed see the object descending east. it appeared to have a cone shape cloud or barrier type trail. i couldn't hear a sound at all. by the time i grabbed my phone it just seemed to disappear. i had a brief feeling of fear, then excitement, then suddenly calm. shortly after witnessing the descent of the object i noticed two planes in the area. one directly where i saw the object disappear, the other farther south west where the object had came from.
content.summary: Bright but fuzzy star like object in the south west clear sky

content.detailedDescription: I took the attached image this morning australia time on my way to gym. the sky was pretty amazing generally this morning, with a lot of striking dark clouds as the sun was slowly beginning to rise. as i walked a route i take every morning to go to gym, i decided to take a photo for insta of a local pub set against this great morning sky. it wasn't until an hour or two later when i looked at the image after i had posted it to insta and facebook that i noticed the three odd lights. admittedly, we are near a flight path, so it could be an aircraft but i've never seen that kind of configuration on an aircraft before at any time as different craft have flown over head. and it is actually just off the standard flight paths that i've seen aircraft head in or out on, so it doesn't fit.
content.summary: Captured in an image - it just doesn't look like a plane. what is it??

content.detailedDescription: 7:27 pm. i looked out my bedroom window that was facing west, and saw a stationary light that i thought was the moon covered with clouds. unable to recognize if it was the moon, i got my binoculars to get a closer look. to my surprise i saw a bright white light that looked like a skinny diamond, and then i saw a smaller white object that came out of the diamond shaped object take off to the northwest. i was thrilled to see this object and decided to call my brother. i wanted someone else to witness this besides myself. i walked to the living room but was unable to get a hold of him. i walked back to my room to resume looking at the object and was surprised when it started moving to the southwest towards el paso, tx. as it moved it left a v-shaped trail behind it that was very bright and noticeable. i got my cell phone and called my sister who resides in el paso and told her that their was a huge bright object headed her way, and to go outside to see if she could see it. as i was watching it move to the southwest it started to fade until it was gone. still on the phone with my sister i told her that it had disappeared and that she probably would'nt see it. end of story. i am always on the lookout for ufo's because growing up in las cruces i have seen over 30 ufo's including a time when me and some friends where sleeping outside during the summer when a ufo shined a light on us twice. but that's another story.
content.summary: Stationary like a star with white mist around it.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to my truck to get my backpack and felt a pull to look up in the sky, i first noticed a shooting star and withing approximately 20 seconds i looked to the southwest to see a bright but fuzzy light off in the distance, it was very slow moving in relation to all of the normal aviation traffic and was flying at an approximate elevation of 1500 feet, i ran inside the house to get the attention of my father, sister and  sisters fiance. when we came outside, the object had not moved far from where i  first observed it.  as we watched it, we  could tell it was starting to change  direction and it began to head in an easterly direction. the entire sky was clear with no clouds in sight, airplanes at various elevations we're seen clearly flying in multiple directions with no cloud cover, one aircraft flew behind it and we lost sight of the airplane due to the cloud and mission or haze around the object and then the airplane became visible again as a came out the other side but the airplane was much further away in distance. object seemed to be emitting it's own vertical bowtie shaped whitish glowing cloud that grew in size as it approached us, as it turned to the east the bowtie turned into a twin tail that continued to grow and widen, the brightest portion of the object seemed to be the point of the cloud as though it we're a jet breaking the sound barrier but moved too slowly with no sound at all. the object seems as though it was moving very slowly yet the cone shaped cloud it was emitting was getting larger and larger to what is guess to be a diameter of 500 ft almost instantaneously. the cloud grew from a twin tail to a full-blown cone shaped cloud in a matter of 10 to 15 seconds the object then seemed to turn more towards the east southeast and began to detach from the cloud and began to dim in brightness until it was completely out of sight and the cloud dissipated and completely disappeared within one to one and a half minutes.
content.summary: Vertical bow tie clouded light came toward us then turned to the south and left a double tail then huge cloud

content.detailedDescription:
heard a roaring,rumbling sound from the kitchen went outside and observed flying object from rear patio overhead two swirling circling green/blue illuminating lights on either side of an oval shape fuselage. never have seen anything like it,not a helicopter or plane. didnt have any blinking lights,wings or propeller as it continued moving in a northern pattern.
what the beck was it?
content.summary: Two swirling green/blue luminated lights on sides of fuselage no other lights noticeable,  oval shape body.

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were driving on i-25 heading south.  at raton pass i noticed a star that was getting brighter. mentioned it to another person in the car. he said i think that is a constellation. it looked like many stars at this point. i took a photo of it and before i could take another it changed direction and shot across the front of us. it was several miles away. it disappeared behind what looked like a cloud but there weren't any clouds visible. it kind of dissipated.  it seems to have light coming out of a tail and although it started out rather ovoid it was triangular at the end of viewing it. three of us saw this object. my thoughts on it, initially i thought it might be space junk or the rocket that was launched this morning. i saw a shooting star (meteorite) after this thing disappeared, but have never seen one change direction.  it is my thought that it was a vehicle of some sort.  i am not posting the photos because i choose to retain my rights.

thank you.
content.summary: At first it looked like a star, then got larger then changed shape and direction then looked like a comet

content.detailedDescription: Bright light with 2 clouded beams. moved east horizontally for about 2 minutes and opened up into two tails that grew into a glowing body/nebula for about 30 seconds until it dissolved. captured the image on video on a dsrl camera.
content.summary: Bright light with 2 clouded beams. move for about 2 minutes and opened up into two tails glowing body/nebula for about 30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
(i am an elementary science teacher who loves to look up at the sky constantly - have a great amazing view of the milky way above my house - so looking at the sky is a very regular and normal thing for me.  i see satellites, iss, once i even the space shuttle trying to dock with the iss one summer long ago, meteors showers, comets, airplanes, and know the difference between them) 

so tonight after driving home from work to do farm chores next door at my parents house (my horse is on their property - share fence line)  i was leaving their house and noticed a light in sky - bright.   did not think much about it so went 500 feet more to my house and turned off engine and went to get out of my truck.  i saw a weird reflected shape/light as i was getting out through my truck window as i was turning to step out/down.  it was bright and i started to saw two small lines in sky... my first thought is it was a weird reflection in my window glass.  i was parked south and my body was facing south west as i moved to exit out of my truck down from my truck to the ground.  

so i stopped getting out of my truck and while standing on my running board looked again at the light/lines and shape forming without being obstructed by the auto glass, i realized that i was really seeing two bright smoky/misty lines of light being formed right in front of my eyes.  i could hardly believe what i was seeing.  it was amazing.  i stepped out of my truck and walked a few steps away from my truck to again verify what i was seeing - the two lines of light were getting longer as the object? was moving south from a south west direction.  while the lines were getting longer - a conical shape was starting to form from what seemed to be a mist or smoke so it looked like a triangle v was forming behind /between the lines.  

it was a that moment i realize that at the front of the v shape there was not a bright light leading the line lights  (there was space between the two lines of light at that center point of the v in the front - they did not meet at the point because something was there even though you could not see it.  i know because the darkness made the starlight disappear as the v lights grew.  the strange sight seemed like it was heading slightly downward at first, but i think that was an illusion as i realize it was heading away from me going from southwest to a more southern direction.

the light was only coming from the lines and the light from the lines were  illuminating the smoke/mist even brighter.  at that point, i was thinking, no one is going to believe me and i should grab my iphone and see if i could take a picture.  i took few steps back to my truck and reached into grab my phone.  when i final found it i tried to take a video and only snapped two pictures by accident - at this point the lights from the lines were fading and the smoke/mist started to form more wide bands of cloud like structures instead of distinct lines of light - eventually forming one large mass of smoke/mist.  

i tried to switch to video mode - but there was not enough light to get the video to record.  by that time, the cloud/light faded completely and what ever was causing this was gone and all the light faded as well.  my two pictures show the very end when things and i can send the better of the two if you would like but it looks like a triangle smudge of specks of light.

i went inside my house after it disappeared, let my dogs out to potty and then back in.  i then went back out by my parked truck and looked at the sky area again for any other weird stuff, cloud like leftovers or other lights and everything seemed back to normal for what i see in that part of the sky.  

i scanned the rest of my sky view all around me looking for anything else out of the ordinary and started to get cold as the temp here is 24 degrees.  i went in and  immediately went on my computer googling to see if others from colorado might have seen what i saw when i came across this site and saw two other people described the same kind of thing v shaped line lights  in ca and az tonight.  

i would not have typed all this in normally, but i feel like maybe we did see something different today.  i know that spacex was doing their thing today, but realize that all that was happening earlier in the day but have thought that it could be connected in some way to what we have seen or heard about yet.  all i know is i have never seen anything like it and honestly never thought i would be documenting a unidentified object like this in my life.

i am excited, curious beyond belief, amazed and would love to know someday what it is i saw.  we do have quite a few military bases here in colorado so it could be something connected with them, it could have been something connected with spacex - the tesla crashing to earth ;)-  or just the weirdest meteor trail ever seen in my life - hard to believe since there was no bright center leading object visible.  but it is a large universe and there are still many things we have yet to learn.
content.summary: Two misty bright light trails (v shape) appeared and left large conical lighted/smoky(misty) shape  - no lights on front center point of v

content.detailedDescription: Bright light with 2 clouded beams. moved east horizontally for about 2 minutes and opened up into two tails that grew into a glowing body/nebula for about 30 seconds until it dissolved. captured the image on video on a dsrl camera.
content.summary: Bright light with 2 clouded beams. moved for about 2 minutes opened up into two tails / glowing body/nebula for 30 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house watching tv with my husband.  my sister who lives 45 minutes away from me asked me to look outside and see if i noticed anything strange in the sky. me and my husband ran outside to look. i thought it was a cloud at first. it was a streak of light behind a foggy veil, i noticed it moving slowly and almost hover before it changed shape and then started moving slowly away and dispersed leaving a hazy fog behind before disappearing. i was a little baffled,and curious because it looked unnatural. i took a few pictures of it. after it disappeared i was stunned at how quickly it vanished. i lost sight after it basically disappeared.
content.summary: Light covered in misty cloud changed shape then dispersed into hazy mist

content.detailedDescription: While driving back from ihop, on i-40 in durham, nc, i observed some interesting/odd shapes within a huge mass of clouds, upon enlarging the photo, at home via: computer, i saw what appeared to be 1-2 disk shaped something, might have been only 1 and the other a shadow, not sure. i used my cell phone to take the picture, samsung amp 2, 5 mp front  facing camera. this might not be anything other then some oddly shaped cloud rings of sorts, it just seemed strange that there would be two so similar almost atop one another and different colors. the coloration between the cloud formations, the whitish line under it all seemed out of place. i don't look for these things, but if i see something that jdlr-just don't look right, i'll follow up on it. i only wish it didn't happen the day after speaking with a mufon investigator in reference to a totally different sighting.
content.summary: Odd shapes in clouds, jdlr-just don't look right

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from a restaurant i looked i saw a hazy point of light in the night sky to the west. it did not appear to move at first but then it became clear that it was moving. slowly. it got a bit brighter when it hit the southernmost point it got really bright. it looked like a missile test but it traveled across the sky really slowly. the conical trail it made vanished but the point of light that it the cone originated from kept going for a bit and faded out. i'm not really sure how long it was up there before i first spotted it.
content.summary: Pinpoint of light surrounded by a haze, nearby stars clear, moved from west to east and created a bright cone of plasma haze before vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Weird bright light traveling in perfectly clear sky but seemed to be surrounded by mist. it moved fairly slow and straight, like a plane, except the light and mist. it ten got brighter and appeared almost like a slow moving fire-ball. it slowly dissolved and was gone.  zooming in on pic,it almost looks like a triangle shaped craft surrounded by mist. in photos we also see a small orange orb near that we did not see with eye. four witnesses.
content.summary: Weird bright light traveling in perfectly clear sky but seemed to be surrounded by mist.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 6:30 pm, my boyfriend and i saw a large object flying across the southern sky. it was round or circle shaped and was glowing white. it had a huge wide white light trail behind it. the trail was more like a wide wedge of clouds that were lit up. it is difficult to explain because there is nothing ive ever seen to compare it to. i dont have the words to describe it clearly. but it almost looked like a huge planet with a wedge shaped light trail. it was traveling extremely fast and straight without wavering. but it suddenly vanished from our field of vision after we watched it for about 10 minutes. it was up higher than any airplane can go. it was a clear cloudless night .
content.summary: An object flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Walking with my daughter at around 6:56 pm pst around 33.7272° n, 116.2995° w. i am a pilot in training and like to watch every single moving light in the sky all the time. so i raised my head to see this one as well. 

at first i thought it was the moon behind the cloud and than quickly realized that moon comes out from the opposite direction and there were no cloud. 
this object looks like the size of a dime has bright white light under some cloaking cloud which were moving with the light. 
speed was similar to the other aircraft in the area. 
it was moving towards 2 other aircraft in the area and it moved fast for fraction of a second and the light came out from the front in arch format from both sides. and than it disappeared after few seconds. 
it has no beacon , no wing lights ( red or green) lights which are seen on an aircraft. just one round light object.
content.summary: A flying object with a cloud cloak on a clear sky with arch shaped wake turbulence
